Summary: Two white lights following each other, no sound, no strobes.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Charleston
There were no other sightings in Charleston on or around November 25th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsMy husband and I were outside smoking, waiting on the pizza to get done, and we both saw 2 white lights following each other at a steady speed. Coming from the north west to south east. They were silent and didn't have strobes. We see aircraft all the time,because we seem to be in a flight path and planes were flying above the lights as they pasted over us. My husband also saw the same lights last night flying side by side. They came from the opposite direction as the ones from tonight. I am really curious to know what they are. Are we being watched?
